description: Radio Astronomy Gain and Visibility Inspector

parameters.info: Gain table(s) to plot. Specify space separated list for multiple
parameters.name: table

parameters.info: Type of gain table(s) to be plotted. Specify as a single character or space separated list for multiple tables.
parameters.name: gaintype

parameters.info: Plot only a specific antenna, or comma-separated list of antennas. Defaults to all
parameters.name: ant

parameters.info: Correlation index (ices) to plot. Defaults to all.
parameters.name: corr

parameters.info: Matplotlib colour map to use for antennas. Defaults to coolwarm
parameters.name: cmap

parameters.info: Spectral window to plot. Defaults to all
parameters.name: ddid

parameters.info: Plot amplitude & phase (ap) or real and imaginary (ri). Defaults to ap.
parameters.name: doplot

parameters.info: Field ID(s) / NAME(s) to plot. Defaults to all
parameters.name: field

parameters.info: File in which to store logs. Default is ragavi.log
parameters.name: logfile

parameters.info: Output HTML file name (with or without .html suffix)
parameters.name: htmlname

parameters.info: Choose the x-xaxis for the K table.
parameters.name: k-xaxis

parameters.info: Static output file name (with suffix). The suffixes can be '.png' or '.svg' and will determine the output type.
parameters.name: plotname

parameters.info: Min time to plot [in seconds]. Defaults to full range]
parameters.name: t0

parameters.info: Max time to plot [in seconds]. Defaults to full range
parameters.name: t1
